article: It had been a tiring day and I was looking forward to a quiet evening. My husband wouldn't come back until late and I had  _  to sit down in a comfortable armchair in the living room and read a book. I  _  the children to bed early and  _  a cold supper and some coffee. Soon I was sitting comfortably with a plate  filled  with food before me and a book at my side. I was just beginning to eat when the telephone rang. I put down my knife and fork and hurried to  _  it. By the time I got back to the living room, my coffee  had got  cold. After I finished my  _  I began to drink my coffee with my book  open  at page one. Suddenly there was a  _  at the door. It gave me such a great surprise that I spilt the  _  and made an ugly stain on my skirt. Some stranger had got  _  and wanted me to show him the way. It  _  ages to get rid of him. At last I  _  to sit down again and actually read a whole page without any more interruption until the baby woke up. He began crying loudly and I rushed upstairs. The baby was  _  awake at eleven o'clock when my husband came home. I should have cried myself when he asked me if I had a(n)  _  evening!
